title: Calories in Boursin Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in Boursin cheese per 100 g, including fat, protein, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for different flavors or servings.
assumptions: Garlic and herb flavored soft cheese; values based on standard commercial product, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, and exact recipe. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of Boursin cheese provides ~420 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of Boursin cheese?
What is the fat content in Boursin cheese?
faqs.a: About 42 g total fat, including 26 g saturated fat per 100 g.
Yes, around 3 g carbs and 2 g sugars per 100 g, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much protein in Boursin cheese?
Is Boursin cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 680 mg sodium per 100 g due to seasoning.
